learned_patterns.description: When publishing to WeChat, ALWAYS use hybrid strategy: 1. Cover to ImgBB (URL) for metadata. 2. Body images as Base64 in HTML. 3. Explicitly insert cover as first body image.
For WeChat images: 1. Add 'Modern minimalist, 2024 trends' to interior prompts. 2. Add 'NO TEXT, NO PINYIN' to negative prompts. 3. Cover image MUST NOT contain text.

failed_cases.issue: WeChat API rejected large Base64 in coverImage field; Body images failed when using ImgBB URLs.
failed_cases.fix: Hybrid Strategy: URL for cover metadata, Base64 for body content.

failed_cases.issue: AI generated Pinyin text 'Li Chun' on cover; Interior style looked outdated.
failed_cases.fix: Added 'NO PINYIN' and 'Modern minimalist' to prompt templates.

failed_cases.issue: Multiple workflow violations: 1) WebSearch failed but AI skipped without reporting; 2) No content confirmation before image generation; 3) No push confirmation; 4) Follower count tracking used ranges instead of specific numbers; 5) Deduplication check happened after topic selection instead of before.
failed_cases.fix: Updated SKILL.md: 1) Step 4 now requires reporting search failures and asking user confirmation; 2) Added user confirmation after content generation; 3) Changed follower tracking to ask for specific numbers; 4) Enforced correct workflow order.
